body:
It is better of course to know useless things than to know nothing.

I have spent more than half a lifetime trying to express the tragic moment.

You traverse the world in search of happiness, which is within the reach of every man. A contented mind confers it on all.

Man shall not live by bread alone.

What counts is not necessarily the size of the dog in the fight it's the size of the fight in the dog.

A bone to the dog is not charity. Charity is the bone shared with the dog, when you are just as hungry as the dog.

At least the box is full of something useful. [On his photo gracing a box of Raisin Bran]

The best way to have a good idea is to have a lot of ideas.

It doesn't do any good to sit up and take notice if you keep on sitting.

A sedentary life is the real sin against the Holy Spirit. Only those thoughts that come by walking have any value.

Deceive not thy physician, confessor, nor lawyer.

The present is the only reality and the only certainty.

Instinct is action taken in pursuance of a purpose, but without conscious perception of what the purpose is.
